infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Used to place a game marker when a user creates a game, display the user's location on the map screen, and check if a user is within range of a game they would like to join.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Used to place a game marker when a user creates a game, display the user's location on the map screen, and check if a user is within range of a game they would like to join.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Used for choosing a profile picture.
